attributes.additional_details:
suggestion to partially tackle recession and  budget deficit  .
present situation is felt to be war-like and need measures like in war-time, overriding  individual/coporate/other rights .
govt  to declare PENSIONS CONTRIBUTIONS HOLIDAY  say for one year taking actions as under:-

suspend  all tax benefits on contributions to ALL pension funds with immediate effect , say 1/10/11 for one year  - to see effects .
 also consider a law to ban contributions to pensions funds  by employers, employees, individuals, etc.
for that one year  as a war-emergency measure suspending any  normal rights against such ban.
more clarifications on  response to this unique idea.
